wiki.content: "Take on Me" is a song by Norwegian new wave band a-ha. Written by the band members, the song was produced by Alan Tarney for the group's first studio album Hunting High and Low, released in 1985. The song combines synthpop with a varied instrumentation, which includes acoustic guitars, keyboards, drums and synthesizers. The original "Take on Me" was recorded in 1984, and took three releases to chart in the United Kingdom, reaching number two on the UK Singles Chart in November 1985. In the United States the song reached the top position of the Billboard Hot 100 in October 1985, due in no small part to the wide exposure of its memorable and cutting-edge music video on MTV; directed by Steve Barron, the video features the band in a pencil-sketch animation/live-action combination called rotoscoping. The video won six awards, and was nominated for two others at the 1986 MTV Video Music Awards. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Take on Me" is a song by Norwegian new wave band a-ha. Written by the band members, the song was produced by Alan Tarney for the group's first studio album Hunting High and Low, released in 1985. The song combines synthpop with a varied instrumentation, which includes acoustic guitars, keyboards, drums and synthesizers. The original "Take on Me" was recorded in 1984, and took three releases to chart in the United Kingdom, reaching number two on the UK Singles Chart in November 1985.

track.name: Take On Me
comments: Love the drum...

It's kinda funny how this song was written before I was ever born but I keep returning to listen every once in a while and I've yet to grow bored with it :) And the video is a brilliant piece of work; I know what happens in it and I still cheer over the ending :D
Surprisingly good, after all those years.
Wowwwww.....haven't heard this in years -- or decades. Don't think I ever even knew the band name.
1985 (for the version i am listening to) sounds great !
This song has one of the best music videos of ALL TIME!
Never understood why 'Take On Me' is so undeservedly more popular than big amount of other songs of a-ha. Too overrated I think.
love this song
good song.
Great song <3
pa pa pa pam ^_^
I never get tired of this song, ever. <3 I love A-ha.
brings me right back to those magic 80's!!!!
